elementSpec.desc: contains a translation of the headword or an example.
contiene una traduzione del lemma o un esempio.
contiene la traducción del lema o de un ejemplo.
見出し語または例の翻訳を示す．

remarks.p: This element is provided as a convenient means to distinguish translation equivalents from other methods of providing sense information, in the cases where such a distinction is desired. Where no such distinction is desired, translation equivalents may be tagged as def or gloss elements.
